org.apache.jcs.engine.control.event
Class ElementEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.apache.jcs.engine.control.event.ElementEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IElementEvent, IElementEventConstants
public class ElementEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
implements IElementEventConstants, IElementEvent

Element events will trigger the creation of Element Event objects. This is a wrapper around the cache element that indicates the event triggered.

See Also:
Serialized Form
